trailingComments.value: Grab all canvas elements, select ones with `data-evn` attributes and create eVN instances for each

leadingComments.value: Grab all canvas elements, select ones with `data-evn` attributes and create eVN instances for each

trailingComments.value: Function to run on canvases with loaded `data-evn` attributes

leadingComments.value: Function to run on canvases with loaded `data-evn` attributes

*
 * A function to run when the page is done loading
 * Loads the fallback font ([Comic Neue]{@link http://comicneue.com/}),
 * Injects CSS styles for fullscreen mode,
 * finds canvas tags with `evn-data` attributes and creates novel instances for each
 * @module eVN/onPageLoad
